Jurisdiction: To generate .ics calendar file use the following VCALENDAR format:
UID - Use iCal_UID column (unique identifier for event)
DTSTART - Use iCal_DTSTART column (deadline date in YYYYMMDDTHHMMSS format)
DTEND - Use iCal_DTEND column (day after deadline)
TRIGGER - Use iCal_ALARM_TRIGGER column (reminder timing in ISO 8601 duration format)
1. Deadline columns show dates for different fiscal year ends (Dec/Mar/Jun)
2. First year has 18-month extended deadline - subsequent years 15 months
3. Per OECD AG no filing obligations arise before 30 June 2026
4. Reminder columns show dates for 90/60/30/14 day advance warnings
6. Status: Pending/In Progress/Filed/Confirmed - update as completed
7. Use iCal columns to generate .ics calendar file for Outlook/Google Calendar
8. Always verify deadlines against official tax authority sources
9. Local registration deadlines may differ from GIR filing deadlines
10. Payment deadlines typically align with filing deadlines but verify locally

Obligation_Type: Filing deadline rules and transitional provisions
Local portal URLs and specific requirements
iCal format standard for calendar interoperability
